xwikidoc.name: MeetingTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
contrib.meeting.home.presentation=Welcome to the XWiki Meeting Application. You can see below all the meetings scheduled so far, and by clicking on "Add a new Entry", you can create your own meeting!
Meeting.MeetingClass_status_value1=In preparation Meeting.MeetingClass_status_value2=Active Meeting.MeetingClass_status_value3=Cancelled Meeting.MeetingClass_status_value4=Finished
contrib.meeting.application.title=Meetings contrib.meeting.calendarView=Calendar View contrib.meeting.calendarView.title=Calendar View contrib.meeting.calendarView.noMacro.admin=To display the calendar view of the meetings, you need to install the Full Calendar Macro on this wiki : contrib.meeting.calendarView.noMacro.noAdmin=We are missing the macro displaying the calendar view. Ask this wiki administrator to install the "FullCalendar" Macro.
meeting.livetable.doc.title=Meeting meeting.livetable.doc.name=Title meeting.livetable.leader=Leader meeting.livetable.place=Place meeting.livetable.durationString=Duration meeting.livetable.startDate=Start meeting.livetable.status=Status meeting.livetable.emptyvalue=- meeting.livetable._actions=Actions
contrib.meeting.field.meetingTitle=Title contrib.meeting.field.leader=Leader contrib.meeting.field.place=Place contrib.meeting.field.duration=Duration contrib.meeting.field.startDate=Start Date contrib.meeting.field.description=Description contrib.meeting.field.participants=Participants contrib.meeting.field.notes=Meeting notes contrib.meeting.field.status=Status
contrib.meeting.notification.success=A notification email has successfully been sent to the participants. contrib.meeting.notification.failure=An error occured while sending the notification emails. contrib.meeting.notification.title=You are invited to participate in a meeting contrib.meeting.notification.body={0} invited you to participate in the meeting {1}. contrib.meeting.notification.link=See the meeting page on XWiki. contrib.meeting.notification.view.event = View your event at contrib.meeting.notification.submit=Send an invitation email to these users contrib.meeting.notification.additionalMessage=Type here the message you want to send to the participants (optional) : contrib.hr.notification.additionalPart=His/her message:
contrib.meeting.panel.title=Next meetings contrib.meeting.panel.noMeetings=There are no upcoming meetings.
contrib.meeting.createPoll=Create a poll for this meeting contrib.meeting.poll.explanation=A poll has been created in order to define the meeting details. Click on the link below to access it. contrib.meeting.poll.go=Go to the poll
